text: Jang Yong-jun (Hangul: 장용준, born May 30, 2000), better known by his stage name No:el (Hangul: 노엘), is a South Korean rapper. He released his first album, Elleonoel, on September 2, 2017. He is also a son of Chang Je-won, an incumbent Member of the National Assembly from the United Future Party. On September 7, 2019, he drove under the influence of alcohol. He later received a suspended sentence for drunk driving and attempting to cover it up. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="1" style="width:5em;" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- !
